    margin-left: 4px;

}

    display: inline;

    width: 175px;
    transition: display;
    transition-delay: 0.5s;
}

.options .option-items:hover .fa-cog {
    animation: option 2s infinite;
}

@keyframes option {
    0% {
        transform: rotate(0deg);
    }
    100% {
        transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
}

.prequest .mainGroupContainer .select2-container--default.select2-container--focus .select2-selection--multiple, .prequest .mainGroupContainer .select2-container--default.select2-container--focus .select2-selection--single {
    outline: 0 !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;

.main-span {
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px;
    background: #FFF;
    /* display: none; */
    margin-left: 13px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    right: 3px;
}

.main-span span {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    background: #FFF;
    display: inline-block;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: absolute;
    left: -4px;
    opacity: 0.7;
    top: -4px;
    animation: spanAnim 0.4s infinite;
}

@keyframes spanAnim {
    0% {
        width: 14px;
        height: 14px;
        left: -4px;
        top: -4px;
    }
    100% {
        width: 6px;
        height: 6px;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
    }
}

    min-height: 32px;
    line-height: 19px;
    font-size: 15px;
    position: relative;
}

}

    -webkit-touch-callout: none;
    /* iOS Safari */
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    /* Safari */
    -khtml-user-select: none;
    /* Konqueror HTML */
    -moz-user-select: none;
    /* Old versions of Firefox */
    -ms-user-select: none;
    /* Internet Explorer/Edge */
    user-select: none;
    /* Non-prefixed version, currently supported by Chrome, Edge, Opera and Firefox */
}

/* Start loader */

@keyframes bouncing-loader {
    from {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 0.1;
        transform: translateY(-1rem);
    }
}

.bouncing-loader {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

.bouncing-loader>div {
    width: 1rem;
    height: 1rem;
    margin: 3rem 0.2rem;
    background: rgb(4, 182, 4);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: bouncing-loader 0.8s infinite alternate;
}

.bouncing-loader>div:nth-child(2) {
    animation-delay: 0.2s;
}

.bouncing-loader>div:nth-child(3) {
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
}

.bouncing-loader>div:nth-child(4) {
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
}

.bouncing-loader>div:nth-child(5) {
    animation-delay: 0.8s;
}

.loader-container {
    display: grid;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
    border: solid;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 999999;
}
